hero.name: Luca Bazzanella
hero.description: Trentino manager, born in 1991, with a background as an advisor within the European Parliament. Specialized in outsourced business management and process digitalization with particular experience in public policy analysis and institutional relations. Always interested in social issues, he is president of the Ermetes scs cooperative and the Sustainable Economy Association, a non-profit organization engaged in international projects with particular focus on North Africa and advocacy actions in favor of new technologies for decarbonization. From 2019 to 2021 Head of the Europe Office of Confcommercio Trentino, the main Category Association in Italy for small and medium enterprises, and since 2020 administrator and operational director of the consulting company European Management Institute. He previously held various political coordination roles at regional and national level in Forza Italia – PDL, leaving all positions in December 2022. Always interested in finding the right balance between business efficiency and social impact.

organizations.title: European Management Institute
organizations.description: Next-generation consulting company specialized in outsourced management, digital transformation, and executive training. Structured in three different business units that support companies and institutions in their reorganization, efficiency, and market development processes.
organizations.approach: European Management contrasts with traditional consulting approaches. It offers selected clients high-value-added solutions that are difficult to find in the market. Uses a "data driven" approach and accepts challenging contracts including "outcome based" types, compensated based on agreed performance indicators.

organizations.title: Cooperativa Ermetes SCS
organizations.description: Mutual cooperative that supports professional integration and work continuity for people in difficulty through contracts and jobs in residential building maintenance and other related services.
organizations.approach: The challenge is to bring managerial and organizational skills to a sector not always focused on efficiency and productivity. The distinctive aspect is the introduction of a "C-level" business management system with worker-member enhancement through efficiency bonuses based on agreed performance indicators for each contract and a specific social impact measurement system.

organizations.title: Sustainable Economy Association
organizations.description: Non-profit organization engaged in international projects with particular focus on North Africa and advocacy actions in favor of new technologies for decarbonization.
organizations.approach: Focus on bridging the gap between sustainable innovation and practical implementation across European markets, with emphasis on measurable environmental and social impact.

outsourcedManagementProjects.title: Executive Trainer for the Government of Mozambique
outsourcedManagementProjects.description: Design and implementation of a customized training program for managers and senior public officials titled "Public-Private Partnership for Local Development". The European-supported initiative aims to strengthen institutional capacity to effectively manage dialogue between Government and citizens both relationally, through active citizen involvement and monitoring satisfaction levels in various areas, and contractually, to enhance public assets and resources while reducing corruption risks and market distortions.

digitalizationProjects.title: Decarbonization and Digital "Carbontrack" and "Ship 24 Green"
digitalizationProjects.description: Direction of integrated digital projects for measuring, tracking, and reducing environmental impact applied in energy efficiency and international logistics. Custom measurement and reduction pathways have been developed based on LCA analysis, business process mapping and optimization, compensation of residual emissions through certified carbon offsetting projects. A digital platform "Ship24Green" was created that allows measuring CO₂eq emissions generated by each customer's deliveries, producing automated monthly reports.

digitalizationProjects.title: Executive Trainer – "Digital Automation in Construction"
digitalizationProjects.description: Design and implementation of an advanced training program for managers and entrepreneurs in the construction sector to introduce innovative digital automation and robotics tools. The program addresses cash flow planning and monitoring to prevent liquidity crises, digitalization and automation of processes to optimize public and private tenders, advanced management control through multi-project management tools, administrative management automation including deadlines and debt collection.

mozambiqueProject.title: Executive Trainer for the Government of Mozambique (2024)
mozambiqueProject.description: Design and implementation of a customized training program for managers and senior public officials titled: "Public-Private Partnership for Local Development".
mozambiqueProject.details: The European-supported initiative aims to strengthen institutional capacity to effectively manage dialogue between Government and citizens both relationally, through active citizen involvement and monitoring satisfaction levels in various areas, and contractually, to enhance public assets and resources while reducing corruption risks and market distortions.
mozambiqueProject.impact: The executive program combines brief theoretical contributions with numerous practical case studies, ensuring concrete learning oriented toward operational application of best practices. A particularly appreciated chapter concerns citizen needs mapping activities aimed at creating "citizen engagement" strategies.

businessEfficiencyProjects.title: Decentralization Training Program

businessEfficiencyProjects.title: Institutional Capacity Building
businessEfficiencyProjects.description: Strategic support for national-level institutional development through targeted training programs. Focus on strengthening governance frameworks, improving public service delivery, and enhancing institutional effectiveness at various administrative levels.

about.publicPolicyDescription: Analysis and implementation of public policies with focus on European frameworks, institutional relations, and strategic policy development for sustainable growth.

publicPolicyProjects.title: European Policy Monitoring - Confcommercio Trentino
publicPolicyProjects.description: As Head of Europe Office, led comprehensive monitoring of European policies and provided strategic support to SMEs in understanding legislative impact. Focused on public procurement, funding opportunities, and regulatory compliance for small and medium enterprises.

publicPolicyProjects.title: EU Programming Trentino 2021-2027
publicPolicyProjects.description: Active participation in the definition of new European programming 2021-2027 for Trentino as a member of the Monitoring Committee for ESF/ERDF programs. Contributed policy documents aimed at revising European fund distribution criteria to make them more accessible and effective for SMEs.

conferences.description: Organization and participation in conferences on management, sustainability and technological innovation topics with focus on public-private partnerships.

conferences.title: NRRP in Trentino: Between opportunities and risks
conferences.topic: A high-profile conference that brought together key local and national stakeholders to discuss the opportunities and challenges of the National Recovery and Resilience Plan for the Trentino territory. The event featured institutional representatives, entrepreneurs and industry experts to analyze implementation strategies for European funds and their impact on the local economic fabric.
conferences.speakers: The conference hosted leading speakers including representatives of the Autonomous Province of Trento, executives from Cassa del Trentino, Confcommercio leadership and European policy experts. A moment of constructive dialogue on ways to access NRRP funds and best practices to maximize their effectiveness in the territory.

conferences.title: Public Private Partnership - Opportunities for SMEs and Local Authorities
conferences.topic: Technical-operational seminar organized in collaboration with the Autonomous Province of Trento, Cassa del Trentino and Confcommercio to explore the potential of Public-Private Partnership as an economic development tool. The event explored the regulatory, financial and operational aspects of PPP contracts, providing concrete tools for SMEs and local authorities.
conferences.speakers: Expert panel composed of public officials, representatives of the local credit system, specialized consultants and entrepreneurs who shared practical experiences in implementing PPP projects. Particular focus on financing opportunities and innovative contractual models for the Trentino territory.

conferences.title: Sustainable Technologies for Mobility
conferences.topic: Series of events dedicated to innovation in the sustainable mobility sector with particular attention to fuel cell technologies for railway transport. The meetings explored the possibilities of applying innovative technologies in the context of Alpine mobility and energy efficiency of transport infrastructure.
conferences.speakers: International energy sector experts, university researchers, representatives of innovative technology companies and public transport officials. The events fostered dialogue between the research world, industry and institutions to promote advanced technological solutions in the sustainable mobility sector.
